Package oracle.mapviewer.share.style

This package contains the bean classes for MapViewer styles.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
StyleModel State model of a style.
 

Class Summary
AbstractStyleModel This class defines an abstract class to represent MapViewer style models.
AreaStyleModel Represents the data model for a MapViewer AREA style.
ColorStyleModel Represents the data model for a MapViewer COLOR style.
LineStyleModel Represents the data model for a MapViewer LINE style.
MarkerStyleModel Represents the data model for a MapViewer MARKER style.
StyleUtils Utility methods to handle styles.
TextHaloInfo Represents a halo model.
TextStyleModel Represents the data model for a MapViewer TEXT style.
TruetypeFont Represents the data model for a MapViewer Truetype font TTF style.
 

Package oracle.mapviewer.share.style Description

This package contains the bean classes for MapViewer styles.
